ygData.subject: Re: Cash flow problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Not everything is about money. There is a reason why your faction increases with the Antonican Bards when you hammer Mistmoor. Vhalen knows why. Go ask him
ygData.messageBody:
Not everything is about money. There is a reason why your faction increases
with the Antonican Bards when you hammer Mistmoor. Vhalen knows why. Go ask
him about it.

The main point was that there are ways to increase faction for bards.
Kelethin guild has at least one. Queynos guild has a few. I don't think that
Freeport has any though...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
